description: You might remember when Cody Cummings recently banged a young blonde woman who had hired him to help her move into a new apartment. But this time, she's bringing a friend into the mix!When Lexy tells her friend Melanie Rios over the phone about her incredibly sexy moving boy, Melanie wants to come over and get her hands (and mouth) on him. Watch the Next Door Stallion pump these ladies good with his fat, hard dick in this super sexy three-way romp!  Enjoy!
series: CC - 6213 - Cody Cummings, Lexy Swallows & Melanie Rios
title: Moving Day Menage
